name: WheelHouse Survival
description:
Shoot monsters to earn points but don't get too close as they will damage you! Will you be able to survive the WheelHouse!! GLHF

Controls:
Keyboard: WASD or arrow keys to navigate and SPACE to jump
Right click to fire gun and aim with mouse.

Download Windows.zip to play this game on your PC. Only built for Windows.

Font is Bloody by James Fordyce at http://www.dafont.com/james-fordyce.d170

Gun model by johndh at http://opengameart.org/content/multi-stroke-air-rifle

Menu Background by Luke.RUSTLTD at http://opengameart.org/content/scrached-and-rusted-metal-panel

Music by xDimebagx & klankbeeld

I am going to keep working on this over the coming weeks. If you have any feedback or even want to help out leave it in the comments! :)
